body.p:
A Belgian Fellowship meeting will take place on 10 July in Brussels. We meet at 19:00 in caf√© Walvis, 209 rue Antoine Dansaert, Brussels. It's a chance to inform others about your activities in the Free Software community and there will be talk of gNewSence and GPLv3.
The meeting is open to Fellows and non-Fellows interested in Free Software. We are looking forward to many attendants!
